author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a validation tool to check goodness of V14 geometry simulation

#### PR validation:

Use the test to validate some simulation results with HGCal V14 geometry

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx262 Add a validation tool to check goodness of V14 geometry simulation
